00039 #ifdef __cplusplus

00041 #endif
00042 
00043 /* The PTE contains:
00044  *
00045  * The process ID of the owning process.
00046  * The virtual page number.
00047  * A pointer to the next IPTE in the hash chain.
00048  * The normal protection, valid, modified bits referenced.
00049  */
00050 #define ILLEGALVPN -1
00051 #define ILLEGALASID -1
00052 
00053 #include "stdlib.h"
00054 #include "Utils.h"
00055 
00056 #ifdef PAGESIZE_64KB
00057 #define CODEDPAGESIZE 2 // 2 .. 64KB
00058 #else
00059 #define CODEDPAGESIZE 1 // 1 .. 4KB
00060 #endif
00061 
00065 #pragma pack(1)
00066 typedef struct _TLBEHIVPNLESS
00067 {
00068         BOOL valid : 1;                         // 1-bit
00069         BOOL instruction : 1;           // 1-bit
00070         int32_t ASID : 8;                       // 8-bits
00071 
00072 }TLBEHIVNPLESS;
00073 
00074 typedef TLBEHIVNPLESS *TLBEHIVNPLESSPtr;
00075 typedef TLBEHIVNPLESSPtr *TLBEHIVNPLESSHdl;
00076 
00081 #pragma pack(1)
00082 typedef struct _TLBEHI
00083 {
00084         int32_t VPN : 22;                       // 22-bits for 1KB 16 for 64KB
00085         BOOL valid : 1;                         // 1-bit
00086         BOOL instruction : 1;           // 1-bit
00087         int32_t ASID : 8;                       // 8-bits
00088 
00089 }TLBEHI;
00090 
00091 typedef TLBEHI *TLBEHIPtr;
00092 typedef TLBEHIPtr *TLBEHIHdl;
00093 
00094 extern TLBEHI IllegalTLBEntryHigh;
00095 
00099 #pragma pack(1)
00100 typedef struct _TLBELOPFNLESS
00101 {
00102         BOOL cachable : 1;                              // 1-bit
00103         BOOL global : 1;                                // 1-bit
00104         BOOL bufferable : 1;                    // 1-bit
00105         uint8_t accessPermissions : 3;  // 3-bits
00106         uint8_t pageSize : 2;                   // 2-bits
00107         BOOL dirty : 1;                                 // 1-bit
00108         BOOL writeThrough : 1;                  // 1-bit
00109 }TLBELOPFNLESS;
00110 
00111 typedef TLBELOPFNLESS *TLBELOPFNLESSPtr;
00112 typedef TLBELOPFNLESSPtr *TLBELOPFNLESSHdl;
00113 
00118 #pragma pack(1)
00119 typedef struct _TLBELO
00120 {
00121         uint32_t PFN : 22;                              // 22-bits
00122         BOOL cachable : 1;                              // 1-bit
00123         BOOL global : 1;                                // 1-bit
00124         BOOL bufferable : 1;                    // 1-bit
00125         uint8_t accessPermissions : 3;  // 3-bits
00126         uint8_t pageSize : 2;                   // 2-bits
00127         BOOL dirty : 1;                                 // 1-bit
00128         BOOL writeThrough : 1;                  // 1-bit
00129 }TLBELO;
00130 
00131 typedef TLBELO *TLBELOPtr;
00132 typedef TLBELOPtr *TLBELOHdl;
00133 
00138 extern TLBELO IllegalTLBEntryLow;
00139 
00143 typedef struct _PageTableEntry
00144 {
00145         TLBEHI tlbEntryHigh;
00146         TLBELO tlbEntryLow;
00147         struct _PageTableEntry *next;
00148 }PageTableEntry;
00149 
00150 typedef PageTableEntry *PageTableEntryPtr;
00151 typedef PageTableEntryPtr *PageTableEntryHdl;
